DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Topical Calcipotriol-assisted AFL-PDT Actinic Keratosis
DOC.detailed_description: Photodynamic therapy ( PDT ) methyl-aminolevulinate ( MAL ) effective treatment actinic keratosis ( AK ) . Many strategy study improve production protoporphyrin IX ( PpIX ) , improve efficacy PDT . Pre-treatment skin fractional laser resurface novel alternative technique improve efficacy PDT AK . The investigator ' previous study show ablative fractional laser prim PDT ( AFL-PDT ) offer high efficacy conventional MAL-PDT treatment AK . But , reduce response rate also observe thicker skin lesion , may due insufficient PpIX accumulation within target tissue . Cellular differentiation lead increase synthesis PpIX MAL consecutively , differentiation therapy enhance photosensitization effect . Topical calcipotriol well-known pro-differentiation hormone demonstrate influence effect PDT keratinocytes . The aim study evaluate efficacy topical vitamin D AFL-PDT AK treatment . Consequently , investigator compare efficacy , recurrence rate , cosmetic outcome safety VitD - AFL-PDT conventional AFL-PDT .
